definitions: Committed (a person or organization) by a solemn promise.
Deposited (something) as security for the repayment of a loan or the fulfillment of a contract.
Drank to the health of (someone or something); toasted.
examples: He pledged allegiance to the flag.
They pledged their support for the cause.
The company pledged assets as collateral.
We pledged a toast to the newlyweds.
